results.title: Study of Diversity of Metformin Related Gastrointestinal Side Effects.
results.text_hl: INTRODUCTION: @<m>DISEASE_Digestive_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004066 @@@Digestive disorders@@@ represent the most common @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ related side-effects in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetics@@@.

results.title: Adverse events of concomitant use of immune checkpoint inhibitors and metformin or statin: an observational, retrospective disproportionality analysis.
results.text_hl: RESEARCH DESIGN AND METHODS: We utilized the Food and Drug Administration Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS) to provide an overview of the adverse event landscape tied to the concomitant utilization of ICI and statins or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. RESULTS: Our study reveals significant side effects associated with combining ICIs with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or statins, including @<m>DISEASE_Digestive_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004066 @@@gastrointestinal, respiratory, hepatobiliary, and renal disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Li W, Wang W. Adverse events of concomitant use of immune checkpoint inhibitors and metformin or statin: an observational, retrospective disproportionality analysis. Expert Opin Drug Saf. 2025 Apr 18;():1-10. PMID: 40232293

results.title: [Cross-Sectional Study on Adverse Effects of Metformin Hydrochloride on 130 Patients Type 2 Diabetic Admitted to Medical Center and Diabetes Home of Sidi Bel-Abbes].
results.text_hl: Five (3.85%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had a total and lasting intolerance to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MetforminHydrochloride@@@ leading to its discontinuation following persistent @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhoea@@@.
